posts.post_content:
All cards have been SOLD!  Thank you.

1) T206 Shag Shaughnessy** w/Old Mill. SGC 30.  Price: $220 SOLD!!!!
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/Cards%20for%20Trade/untitled.jpg[/IMG]
**I also have a Shaughnessy PSA 4 with Piedmont 350 back available for sale.  Email me if interested.

2) T206 Walter Johnson (portrait) w/Sovereign 150. PSA 2 Price: $350 SOLD!!!!
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/Cards%20for%20Trade/1909-11T-206JohnsonWalterportraitSO.jpg[/IMG]

3) T206 Cy Young (portrait). SGC 20.  An absolutely stunning card for the grade. Good corners and centering is very good.  The only flaw is the pinhole towards the top of the card that doesn't interfere with the image.  The best looking SGC 20 you will ever see.  Price: $425. SOLD!!!!
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/Cards%20for%20Trade/1909-11T-206YoungCyportraitPiedmont.jpg[/IMG]

4) T206 Cy Young (glove showing) SGC 40. Price $425 SOLD!!!!
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/Cards%20for%20Trade/1909-11T-206YoungCygloveshowingPIED.jpg[/IMG]

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card(s).

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Payment by check or MO preferred.  Paypal also accepted.

Price includes first class shipping and delivery confirmation.

Eric:
I'll take the Young Portrait

[url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
Piedmont150....the card is yours.  Email sent.

Thanks Toby.  They are both yours.  PM sent.  

The only card left is the Shag.  Listening to offers.

Thanks for looking.
